message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be very valuable to you.  I'm asking $14,000 for it, which is a fair price considering its worth to me.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $11,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,000 is the lowest I can go.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,200. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
